Glimmer - Double Jump to OoB Ledge.description: Double jump from the starting area in Glimmer to the OoB ledge. Note that getting to the indoor superflight archway ledge or the outdoor gem lamps area requires Glide.

Glimmer - Outdoor Gem Lamps with Flamech.description: Light the outdoor gem lamps without superflight using flamecharge jumps.

Glimmer - Gem Lamp Flight In Cave Orb Cu.description: Utilize the 'orb get' cutscene for 'Gem Lamp Flight in cave' to obtain gems on the flight archway's ledge without normal access to it.
